name: Ballroom Results Explorer
tagline: Scraping competition results data for collegiate teams everywhere.
body:
### Welcome.
This visualization tool is the result of a final project for CS 171, Data Visualization, at Harvard University. Using Cloud Cray's [DanceMarkScraper](https://github.com/CloudCray/DanceMarkScraper/), I've aggregated data from [O2CM](http://www.o2cm.com/)'s published results from the past seven years, and created a visualization tool that lets you compare results (yours, your friends', or your whole team's) across competitions and years.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
